result.eng: The king's only son was killed.
result.html: Maraíodh aonmhac an ríThe king's only son was killed.
result.ponchtml: Maraíoḋ aonṁac an ríThe king's only son was killed.

result.ga: Baineadh an ceann den rí
result.html: Baineadh an ceann den ríThe king was decapitated.
result.ponchtml: Baineaḋ an ceann den ríThe king was decapitated.

result.eng: He threatened the king with revenge.
result.ga: Bhagair sé díoltas ar an rí
result.orig: Bhagair sé díoltas ar an rí
result.html: Bhagair sé díoltas ar an ríHe threatened the king with revenge.
result.ponchtml: Ḃagair sé díoltas ar an ríHe threatened the king with revenge.

result.ga: Bhí triúr iníonacha ag an rí
result.orig: Bhí triúr iníonacha ag an rí
result.html: Bhí triúr iníonacha ag an ríThe king had three daughters.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí triúr iníonaċa ag an ríThe king had three daughters.

result.eng: Once upon a time there was a king.
result.ga: Fadó fadó bhí rí ann
result.html: Fadó fadó bhí rí annOnce upon a time there was a king.
result.ponchtml: Fadó fadó ḃí rí annOnce upon a time there was a king.

result.eng: He was made king when he reached 18 years of age.
result.ga: Rinneadh rí de nuair a shroich sé 18 mbliana d'aois
result.orig: Rinneadh rí de nuair a shroich sé 18 mbliana d'aois
result.html: Rinneadh rí de nuair a shroich sé 18 mbliana d'aoisHe was made king when he reached 18 years of age.
result.ponchtml: Rinneaḋ rí de nuair a ẛroiċ sé 18 mbliana d'aoisHe was made king when he reached 18 years of age.

result.eng: The waged war on the king's army to acquire the temple.
result.ga: Chuir siad cogadh ar arm an rí chun seilbh a fháil ar an teampall
result.orig: Chuir siad cogadh ar arm an rí chun seilbh a fháil ar an teampall
result.html: Chuir siad cogadh ar arm an rí chun seilbh a fháil ar an teampallThe waged war on the king's army to acquire the temple.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir siad cogaḋ ar arm an rí ċun seilḃ a ḟáil ar an teampallThe waged war on the king's army to acquire the temple.
